title: The Cat in the hat
brief_description: Impulsive and imaginative, the Cat romps through the house dispelling boredom for a brother and sister on a rainy day, while their mother is away. Invites children to become self-sufficient in their use of time. Adapted from the book by Dr. Seuss.
